00036 #ifndef _LIBCFS_BITMAP_H_
00037 #define _LIBCFS_BITMAP_H_
00038 
00039 struct cfs_bitmap {
00040         unsigned int size;
00041         unsigned long data[0];
00042 };
00043 
00044 #define CFS_BITMAP_SIZE(nbits) \
00045         (((nbits / BITS_PER_LONG) + 1) * sizeof(long) + \
00046         sizeof(struct cfs_bitmap))
00047 
00048 static inline
00049 struct cfs_bitmap *CFS_ALLOCATE_BITMAP(int size)
00050 {
00051         struct cfs_bitmap *ptr;
00052 
00053         LIBCFS_ALLOC(ptr, CFS_BITMAP_SIZE(size));
00054         if (ptr == NULL)
00055                 RETURN(ptr);
00056 
00057         ptr->size = size;
00058 
00059         RETURN(ptr);
00060 }
00061 
00062 static inline void CFS_RESET_BITMAP(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap)
00063 {
00064         if (bitmap->size > 0) {
00065                 int nbits = bitmap->size;
00066 
00067                 memset(bitmap, 0, CFS_BITMAP_SIZE(nbits));
00068                 bitmap->size = nbits;
00069         }
00070 }
00071 
00072 #define CFS_FREE_BITMAP(ptr)    LIBCFS_FREE(ptr, CFS_BITMAP_SIZE(ptr->size))
00073 
00074 static inline
00075 void cfs_bitmap_set(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap, int nbit)
00076 {
00077         set_bit(nbit, bitmap->data);
00078 }
00079 
00080 static inline
00081 void cfs_bitmap_clear(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap, int nbit)
00082 {
00083         test_and_clear_bit(nbit, bitmap->data);
00084 }
00085 
00086 static inline
00087 int cfs_bitmap_check(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap, int nbit)
00088 {
00089         return test_bit(nbit, bitmap->data);
00090 }
00091 
00092 static inline
00093 int cfs_bitmap_test_and_clear(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap, int nbit)
00094 {
00095         return test_and_clear_bit(nbit, bitmap->data);
00096 }
00097 
00098 /* return 0 is bitmap has none set bits */
00099 static inline
00100 int cfs_bitmap_check_empty(struct cfs_bitmap *bitmap)
00101 {
00102         return find_first_bit(bitmap->data, bitmap->size) == bitmap->size;
00103 }
00104 
00105 static inline
00106 void cfs_bitmap_copy(struct cfs_bitmap *new, struct cfs_bitmap *old)
00107 {
00108         size_t newsize;
00109 
00110         LASSERT(new->size >= old->size);
00111         newsize = new->size;
00112         memcpy(new, old, CFS_BITMAP_SIZE(old->size));
00113         new->size = newsize;
00114 }
00115 
00116 #define cfs_foreach_bit(bitmap, pos)                                    \
00117         for ((pos) = find_first_bit((bitmap)->data, bitmap->size);      \
00118              (pos) < (bitmap)->size;                                    \
00119              (pos) = find_next_bit((bitmap)->data, (bitmap)->size, (pos) + 1))
00120 
00121 #endif
